meanings.definition: A gambling game similar to bingo.
meanings.sent1: Let's try our luck at keno tonight!
meanings.sent2: I enjoy playing keno with my friends at the casino.
meanings.sent3: The keno game was so exciting that everyone was on the edge of their seats.
meanings.sent4: In the world of gambling, keno is like a thrilling rollercoaster ride.
meanings.sent5: The colorful keno balls bouncing around added to the excitement of the game.

meanings.definition: To play the game of keno.
meanings.sent1: We should keno after dinner for some fun.
meanings.sent2: She kenoed with enthusiasm, hoping for a big win.
meanings.sent3: After work, they always keno to relax and unwind.
meanings.sent4: His heart raced as he kenoed, hoping for a lucky outcome.
meanings.sent5: Kenoing together brought them closer as friends.

meanings.definition: A ticket used to play keno.
meanings.sent1: Don't forget to grab your keno before heading to the game.
meanings.sent2: The keno had all the numbers carefully marked for the draw.
meanings.sent3: She accidentally spilled coffee on her keno, causing a mess.
meanings.sent4: The winning keno was tucked safely in his pocket, waiting to be claimed.
meanings.sent5: The torn keno revealed the lucky numbers underneath, bringing joy to the player.
